name: Red Graphic
tag_list: interactive-agency, advertising, promo-site, banner, rich-media, online-game, web-application, web-development, branding, web-design, content-development, project-support, project-update
overview: Red Graphic – an interactive agency, which creates promo-projects in the Internet. Who we are? We develop web-sites, which are discussed in forums, which links people are sending to their friends. Our agency creates online-games and interactive services in the web, which are of particular interest to the target audience, and therefore effective in terms of brand promotion. Red Graphic is on the advertising market since 1992, in the Internet – since 1998. We have established good relations with clients from Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Holland, France, USA. We enjoy what we do a lot, and we make our clients, and our clients’ clients enjoy it as much as we do. What we do? Interactive advertising: strategy of interaction with audience, creative concepts, promo-sites, banners, rich-media, online-games and web-applications. Web-development: branding, web-design, content development, project support and project update.
